author: justknoweverything
body: I like how you use ADSK, the biggest fucking joke of a company and shittiest software other than adobe and these dumbfuck investors continue to prob that shit up like it's some amazing growth stock and amazing tech.  I can't wait until a competitor destroys that fucking loser overvalued joke of a company.

body: Why did I buy bunch of ADSK shares rn 🤷

author: QPMKE
body:
$CHU and $CHL. China is pioneering 5G and they don't get enough credit for it. $SKM is another foreign telecom company on my radar. $S is probably worth looking at with the upcoming merger with T-Mobile.

$QCOM and $TSM are also companies I think will play a big role in 5G development and component manufacturing.

author: mark0fo
body:
One observation I've made over the years is that questions about leveraging and enthusiasm for it seem to peak on Internet message boards around the times of market tops.

Leverage is great -- if you do it when nobody else is.  Or into assets that nobody else likes.  Hardly something you can say at least with respect to MSFT QCOM, etc.

author: 7YearOldCodPlayer
body:
Surprised I had to scroll far for QCOM.

They're arguably one of the most exposed to 5g and already have the technology to do it, just waiting on others.
